ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##ÊúÄÊñ∞Ôºö}}`
info = ` 
üìñ ‰π¶ÂêçÔºö{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
üë§ ‰ΩúËÄÖÔºö{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
üìú ÁØáÂπÖÔºö{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
üîñ Ê†áÁ≠æÔºö{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
üóø ËÇâÈáèÔºö{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
‚úè  ËØÑÂàÜÔºö{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
üï∞ ÊúÄÊñ∞Ôºö{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##ÊúÄÊñ∞Ôºö}}
üëÅ ËßÇÁúãÔºö{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
‚ù§Ô∏è Êî∂ËóèÔºö{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
üè∑ ÁÆÄ‰ªãÔºö{{@@class.brief@text##Â∞èËØ¥ÁÆÄ‰ªãÔºö}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
üìñ ‰π¶ÂêçÔºö{{book.name}}
üë§ ‰ΩúËÄÖÔºö{{book.author}}
üè∑ ÁÆÄ‰ªãÔºö{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"ÂÆåÁªì":"ËøûËΩΩ"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); } else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){ result = "ËØ∑Âà∑Êñ∞ÈáçËØïÊàñÁÇπÂºÄ‰∏äÊñπÁ´†ËäÇÈìæÊé•ËøõË°åÈ™åËØÅ"; }}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

‚åöÔ∏è Êó∂ÈïøÔºö{{$.model.durationFormat}}

üìÜ Êó•ÊúüÔºö{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

üé• Êí≠ÊîæÔºö{{$.model.viewCount}}Ê¨°

üì© Êî∂ËóèÔºö{{$.model.collectCount}}

üïµ ÁâáÂïÜÔºö{{$.model.authors}}

üë§ ‰∏ä‰º†Ôºö{{$.model.uploader}}

üîñ Ê†áÁ≠æÔºö{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

üè∑ ÁÆÄ‰ªãÔºö{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('Ê≠£Âú®Âä†ËΩΩËßÜÈ¢ë\nËßÜÈ¢ëÂä†ËΩΩËæÉÊÖ¢ÔºåËØ∑ËÄêÂøÉÁ≠âÂæÖ'); } '„ÄêÂà∑Êñ∞Ê≠£Êñá„ÄëÊí≠Êîæ\n‚úÖÁõ¥Èìæ:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

ruleSearch.bookUrl:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
'{{getUrl()}}novel/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	'{{getUrl()}}comic/intro?id={{$.id}}'
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id={{$.id}}&viewId='+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000)
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
'{{getUrl()}}api/audio/app/audio/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('ÂΩìÂâç‰∏∫Â∞èËØ¥Ê®°Âºèüßæ'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /Â±ïÂºÄÁ´†ËäÇ/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/Ê∏∏ÂÆ¢/g,'‚ú®').replace(/Â∏Å/g,'üí∞').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /Â∏Å/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('ÂΩìÂâç‰∏∫Êº´ÁîªÊ®°Âºèüßæ'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /Â±ïÂºÄÁ´†ËäÇ/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/Ê∏∏ÂÆ¢/g,'‚ú®').replace(/Â∏Å/g,'üí∞').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /Â∏Å/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('ÂΩìÂâç‰∏∫ËßÜÈ¢ëÊ®°Âºèüßæ');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('ÂΩìÂâç‰∏∫Âê¨‰π¶Ê®°Âºèüßæ');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
if (x == 0){
'{{getUrl()}}'+
'api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword={{key}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
}else if (x == 1) {
	'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
	}else if (x == 2 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/video/app/video/search?keyword={{key}}&orderType=1&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=40'
		}else if (x == 3 ) {
'{{getUrl()}}'+'api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page={{page}}&searchType=1&size=42'
}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//Â§ÑÁêÜÂº∫Âà∂ÁôªÂΩï
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//Ëá™Âä®Â§ÑÁêÜÈ™åËØÅ
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("ÊªëÂä®È™åËØÅ")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("È™åËØÅCookieÔºö" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("Ê£ÄÊµãÂà∞È™åËØÅ,Â∞ùËØïËá™Âä®Â§ÑÁêÜ‚Ä¶‚Ä¶");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "Ëá™Âä®È™åËØÅÂ§±Ë¥•ÔºåËØ∑ÈáçËØï!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//Â§ÑÁêÜÈáçÊñ∞Ëé∑ÂèñÊñáÊú¨Êó∂ÂèØËÉΩ‰ºöÂá∫Áé∞ÁöÑÈîôËØØ„ÄÇ
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`Êú™Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞ÊñáÊú¨ÔºåÊ≠£Âú®ÈáçËØï...ÔºàÂΩìÂâçÁ¨¨${retryCount}Ê¨°ÈáçËØïÔºâ`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "ÈáçËØï‰∏âÊ¨°‰ªçÁÑ∂Êú™Ëé∑ÂèñÂà∞ÊñáÊú¨ÔºåËØ∑Ê£ÄÊü•ÁΩëÁªúÁä∂ÂÜµ„ÄÇ"
}
result;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: {{@@span.2@text}}
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if (baseUrl.match(/http/)){
let base64 = java.base64Encode(baseUrl);
let result = `data:;base64,${base64},{"type":"url"}`;
java.put('url',result)
let url = java.base64Decode(base64);
java.ajax(url);}else{
java.ajax(java.hexDecodeToString(result))
}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[0]
intro=` 
üìñ ‰π¶ÂêçÔºö{{@@span.1@text##.*„Ää|„Äã}}
üë§ ‰ΩúËÄÖÔºö{{@@span.2@text##‰ΩúËÄÖÔºö}}
üîñ Ê†áÁ≠æÔºö{{@@div[style="line-height:2;"]@text##Ê†áÁ≠æÔºö}}
üï∞ ÊúÄÊñ∞Ôºö{{@@.divbg@li.0@a@text}}
üè∑ ÁÆÄ‰ªãÔºö{{@@.tabvalue.0@text##\s}}
‚≠ê Â±ûÊÄßÔºö
{{@@tbody.0@tr.1:2@td@text}}`
if(x>=1){
let pl = '\n­\n„Äê‚ú®ËØÑËÆ∫‚ú®„ÄëÊúÄÊñ∞';
p=result.match(/bid\=(.*?)\'\,\s/)[1]||1;
pi=`{{getUrl()}}modules/article/reviews.php?aid=${p}&page=${x}`
po=java.ajax(pi)
r2=String(java.getString('#jieqi_page_contents>.c_row@html',po));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|ÂõûÂ§çÔºö.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'‚õÑ„Äê$1„Äë');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}else if(x<1){
let pl = '\n­\n„Äê‚ú®ËØÑËÆ∫‚ú®„ÄëÊúÄÊñ∞';
r2=String(java.getString('#content>.c_row@html'));
r2 = r2.replace(/<div class="c_subject"[\S\s]+?div>|<span class="fr"[\S\s]+?span>|ÂõûÂ§çÔºö.+/g,'').replace(/<p[> ](.+)<\/p>/g,'\n­\n‚õÑ„Äê$1„Äë');
result=intro+pl+r2
result=r2?result:intro
}
</js>

let url = `${getUrl()}modules/article/search.php`;
try {{
		url +=	`?searchkey=${key}&searchtype=all&page=${page}`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	}
code = ss.statusCode();

	ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
		`data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;

}
	}catch(err) {

	}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*
version: 2025.0205
ÂÆåÂñÑÂèëÁé∞,Ê∑ªÂä†ÊêúÁ¥¢Êé•Âè£byÊ≤≥ÈπÖÂíå
‰ºòÂåñÊêúÁ¥¢ÂèëÁé∞
ÁõÆÂΩï‰π±Â∫è‰øÆÂ§çbyÊäòÊú®
ÁõÆÂΩï‰π±Â∫è‰øÆÂ§çÂèØÈÄöËøáËÆæÁΩÆ‰π¶Á±çÂèòÈáèÊù•ÂºÄÂêØÔºåÈªòËÆ§ÂÖ≥Èó≠
ÂèëÁé∞Ê∑ªÂä†ÊúÄÊñ∞ÂÖ•Â∫ìÔºåÈúÄË¶ÅÂÖàÁôªÂΩïÊûÑÈÄ†Êú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆ
Ê∑ªÂä†Êú¨Âú∞ÊêúÁ¥¢ÔºåÂèØÈÄöËøáÊûÑÈÄ†ÁöÑÊú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆËøõË°åÊêúÁ¥¢ÔºåÂú®ÊêúÁ¥¢ÂÖ≥ÈîÆËØçÂâçÂä†‰∏äname:,id:,author:,tags:Âç≥ÂèØÊåáÂÆöÊêúÁ¥¢Á±ªÂûãÔºåÈªòËÆ§‰∏∫ÊêúÁ¥¢‰π¶ÂêçÔºå‰æãÂ≠êÔºöauthor:‰ΩöÂêç
ÂΩìÂâçÊîØÊåÅÁ±ªÂûãÊúâauthor,category,id,intro,name,pornrate,score,status,tags,update,word,allÔºåÂàÜÂà´ÊòØÊêúÁ¥¢‰ΩúËÄÖ,ÂàÜÁ±ª,‰π¶ID,ÁÆÄ‰ªã,‰π¶Âêç,ËÇâÈáè,ËØÑÂàÜ,Áä∂ÊÄÅ,Ê†áÁ≠æ,Êõ¥Êñ∞,Â≠óÊï∞,ÂÖ®ÈÉ®
ÂèëÁé∞Ëá™Âä®Ê∑ªÂä†‰π¶Á±çÂà∞Êú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆ
Êú¨Âú∞ÊêúÁ¥¢ÊîØÊåÅÊ≠£ÂàôÔºå‰æãÔºöid:^95[5-9]\d$„ÄÅall:(ÁôΩÂ§©|ÈªëÂ§ú)
Ê∑ªÂä†Êõ¥Â§öÊéíÂ∫èÈÄâÊã©
Ê∑ªÂä†ËÆæÁΩÆÊØèÊ¨°Âπ∂ÂèëÊï∞
2025.01.31 ‰øÆÊîπÊú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆ‰øùÂ≠òÊñπÊ≥ïÔºå‰∏çÂÜç‰øùÂ≠òÂà∞Ê∫êÂèòÈáè
02.01 ‰ºòÂåñÁõÆÂΩï‰π±Â∫è‰øÆÂ§ç
02.04 ‰ºòÂåñÊú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆ‰øùÂ≠òÔºåÂ∞ÜÊï∞ÊçÆÂàáÂàÜÊØè50‰∏á‰∏™Â≠óÁ¨¶‰øùÂ≠òÔºåÊï∞ÊçÆÁΩëÁªúÂØºÂá∫ÊúÄÂ§ß‰∏∫10MÔºåË∂ÖËøá10MËØ∑‰ΩøÁî®Êú¨Âú∞ÂØºÂá∫
02.05 ‰ºòÂåñÁîüÊàêÂèëÁé∞ÊñπÊ≥ï
*/
api = [
`https://www.aaccnn.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aahhss.com/e/search/,{
  "body": "keyboard=${key}",
  "method": "POST"
}`,
`https://www.aakkrr.com/book/${key}<,/${page}>`,
toDataUrl(key,page-1)]
v = String(checkData()['api'])
result = api[v.match(/^\d+$/)?v:2]

ruleBookInfo.author: [property="og:novel:author"]@content
ruleBookInfo.name: [property="og:novel:book_name"]@content

ruleExplore.author: $.author
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
booklist=[]
$=checkData()
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key,page,sortType]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word):/.test(key)){
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
		}else{
			[key,page]=String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
			type="name"
			}
			books=$.books
	for (let i in books){
    books[i]["id"]=i
    booklist.push(books[i])
    }
    Regkey=createRegExp(key)
    booklist=booklist.filter(b=>String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
  
  if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType){
  st=sortType||$.sortType
  booklist.sort((a,b)=>getSortValue(a,st)-getSortValue(b,st))
  	}
  if(!$.order){
  	booklist.reverse()
  	}
  if (booklist.length>0&&page==0)java.toast(`\n‚úÖÊàêÂäüËé∑Âèñ${booklist.length}Êú¨‰π¶Á±ç`)
  else if((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0)java.toast("\n‚ö†Ô∏èËØ∑ÂÖàÁôªÂΩïÊûÑÈÄ†Êú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆ")
  booklist=getl(booklist,page);
	}else {
		result=java.getElements(".book-like a")
		count=0
		result.forEach(r=>{
			id=java.getString("href",r).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
			temp={name:java.getString('h4@text',r),author:java.getString("span@text",r),cover:String(java.getString("img@src",r)).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,"")}
			if (!(id in $.books)){
				$.books[id]=Object.assign({},temp)
				count++
				}
			temp.id=id
			booklist.push(temp)
			})
		if (count>0){
			java.toast(`\n‚úÖÊú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆÊñ∞Â¢û${count}Êú¨`)
			setv($)
			}
		}
JSON.stringify(booklist)
</js>
$[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.name

ruleSearch.author: {{baseUrl.match(/\/e\//)?java.getString('span@text'):""}}{{$.author||""}}
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
java.log(baseUrl)
if(baseUrl=="http://localhost/"){
	[key, page, sortType] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
	if (/^(author|category|id|intro|name|pornrate|score|status|tags|update|word|all)[:]/.test(key)) {
		[type,key]=key.split(/:([\w\W]+)?/,2)
	} else {
		[key, page] = String(java.hexDecodeToString(result)).split("|==|")
		type="name"
	}
	$=checkData()
	books=$.books
	booklist=[]
	for (let i in books) {
		books[i]["id"]=i
		type == "all" ? Object.defineProperty(books[i], 'all', {
			get: function(){
				return JSON.stringify(this)
			}
		}) : ""
		booklist.push(books[i])
	}
	Regkey=createRegExp(key)
	booklist = booklist.filter(b => String(b[type]).match(Regkey))
	if(/(pornrate|score|update|word)/.test($.sortType)||sortType) {
		st = sortType || $.sortType
		booklist.sort((a, b) => getSortValue(a, st)-getSortValue(b, st))
	}
 if (!$.order) {
 	booklist.reverse()
 	}
 	if (booklist.length>0&&page==0) java.toast(`\n‚úÖÊàêÂäüËé∑Âèñ${booklist.length}Êú¨‰π¶Á±ç\nÂΩìÂâç‰∏∫Êåâ${$.sortType=="pornrate"?"ËÇâÈáè":($.sortType=="score"?"ËØÑÂàÜ":($.sortType=="word"?"Â≠óÊï∞":($.sortType=="update"?"Êõ¥Êñ∞":"ID")))}${$.order?"‚¨ÜÔ∏èÊ≠£":"‚¨áÔ∏èÂÄí"}Â∫èÊéíÂàó`)
 	else if ((!booklist.length>0)&&page==0) java.toast("\n‚ùéÊú¨Âú∞Êï∞ÊçÆÊú™ÊâæÂà∞ÔºåËØ∑ÂàáÊç¢ÊêúÁ¥¢Êé•Âè£")
 	booklist=getl(booklist,page);
 	java.setContent(JSON.stringify(booklist))
 	result=java.getElements("$[*]")
}else result=java.getElements(".book-like a||.grid-item")
</js>
ruleSearch.name: {{@h4@text||h3@text||""}}{{$.name||""}}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
let e = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result);
try{
	v = checkData()
	id=String(e.select('[property="og:novel:read_url"]').attr("content")).match(/book\/(\d+)/)[1]
	v.books[id]={author:e.select('[property="og:novel:author"]').attr("content"),category:Object.values(e.select(".categories a").textNodes()),cover:String(e.select('[property="og:image"]').attr("content")).replace(/.*file\/cover\//,""),intro:e.select('.book-desc').textNodes().toArray().join(""),name:e.select('[property="og:novel:book_name"]').attr("content"),pornrate:e.select('.pornrate dd').text(),score:Number(e.select('.score dd').text()),status:e.select('[property="og:novel:status"]').attr("content"),tags:Object.values(e.select('.tag a').textNodes()),update:String(e.select('.new dd').textNodes()[0]).trim(),word:e.select(".wordcount dd").text()}
	setv(v)
} catch(error) {
	java.log(error)
}
let chapters = e.select(".book-chapter a");
let chapterData = [];
let chapterNumber = 0;
if (book.getVariable("custom") != "") {
	   java.toast("\n‚úÖÁõÆÂΩï‰π±Â∫è‰øÆÂ§çÂ∑≤ÂºÄÂêØ")
	   chapters.forEach((item) => {
        let title = item.text()
        let chapterNumberMatch = title.match(/Á¨¨(\d+)(-\d+)?Á´†/);
        if (chapterNumberMatch) {
            chapterNumber = parseInt(chapterNumberMatch[1], 10);
        }
        chapterData.push({
            number: chapterNumber,
            text: title,
            href: item.attr("href")
        });
    });
    chapterData.sort((a, b) => a.number - b.number);
} else {
    chapterData = chapters
}
chapterData
</js>
